component.name: Tags Input
component.description: A tags input component for managing collections of text tags or labels with flexible input options. Features tag creation through various input methods, tag removal, duplicate prevention, and customizable tag display with icons and colors.

variants.name: Default
variants.description: A user-friendly tags input implementation with intuitive tag creation, clear removal controls, visual tag organization, and smooth interactions. Effectively manages tag collections with smooth interactions and helpful visual feedback for optimal user experience.
